posts.title: MOSCOW MULE
posts.text: MUDDLE: LIMES + SUGAR 1.5 OZ VODKA GINGER BEER

posts.title: BLOODY MARY
posts.text: BLOODY MARY USUALLY ORDERED ON SAT/SUN AFTERNOON. ROCKS/HIGHBALL GLASS WITH ICE 1.5 OZ VODKA BLOODY MARY PREMIXED DASH OF WORCESTERSHIRE &TABASCO, LIME SQUEEZE, BLACK PEPPER, AND TOMATO JUICE. LIME WEDGE & CELERY STICK *Virgin Mary: WITHOUT VODKA. *Worcestershire sauce is a fermented condiment made from a base of vinegar and flavored with anchovies, molasses, tamarind, onion, garlic, and other seasonings.(伍斯特郡酱汁是一种用醋基制成的发酵调味品，并以鯷鱼，糖蜜，罗望子，洋葱，大蒜和其他调味料调味) P.S. BLOODY MARIA: TEQULIA BLOODY BULL: BEEF BROTH BLOODY CEASAR: CLAM JUICE(CLAMATO) MICHELADA (MEXICAN BLOODY MARY) Mexican lager beer (Modelo is typical) Clamato (or tomato juice, if you really can’t stomach the idea of clam juice in your beer) 3-4 splashes hot sauce, more or less to taste. I use Tapatío. 2 splashes of Worcestershire sauce 2 splashes of Maggi sauce (or soy sauce) Juice of one lime Tajín seasoning (or salt) for the rim

posts.title: MINT JULEP
posts.text: MUDDLE: MINT LEAVES, 1 TSP.SUGAR, SPLASH WATER 1.75 OZ BOURBON ICE MINT LEAVES IF YOU SHAKEICE IN THE GLASS, BOURBON, SYRUP + FRESH MINT + CLUB SODA

posts.title: :MOJITO
posts.text: IN A SHAKER TO MUDDLE: TSP.SUGAR(A SUGAR CUBE) + 2 DASHES OF LIME JUICE + 3-4 MINT LEAF +SPLASH OF CLUB SODA 1.5 OZ RUM ICE IN GLASS MINT LEAVE CAIPIRINHA:REPLACE RUM TO CACHACA(BALIZIAN RUM), MINT LEAVE TO LIME.

posts.title: OLD FASHIONED
posts.text: MUDDLE: A SUGAR CUBE(1 TSP.SUGAR) / CHILLED SYRUB + 2 DASHES BITTER + CHEERY & ORANGE SLICE + SPLASH SODA WATER(DISSOLVE SUGAR) IN A SHAKER 1.5 OZ BOURBON / WHISKEY ICE IN A GLASS SPLASH OF CLUB SODA CHERRY, ORANGE SLICE, LEMON TWIST

posts.title: STINGER
posts.text: ICE 1.5 OZ BRANDY + 0.5 OZ WHITE CREME DE MENTHE MINT LEAVE ITALIAN STINGER: BRANDY & GALLIANO METAXA(GREEK BRANDY)& GALLIANO ADDITIONALS USE VODKA + GREEN CREAM DE MENTHE

posts.title: DIRTY MOTHER
posts.text: ICE 1.5 OZ BRANDY + 0.5 OZ KAHLUA CREAM

posts.title: GIMLETS
posts.text: ICE 1.5 OZ VODKA / GIN 0.5 OZ LIME JUICE OR FREASH MUDDLE FRESH LIMES LIME

posts.text: BLACK RUSSIAN ICE 1.5 OZ VODKA 0.5 OZ KAHLUA WHITE RUSSIAN ICE 1.5 OZ VODKA + 0.5 OZ KAHLUA CREAM SHAKE COLORADO BULLDOG: WH.RUSSIAN + COLA FLOAT POPULAR VODKA: TITO’S, DEWARD’S, KETEL ONE, ABSOLUTE, GRAY GOOSE.

posts.title: GOD-FAMILY

posts.text: ICE IN THE ROCKS GLASS 1.5 OZ SCOTCH 0.5 OZ DRAMBUIE herbs, honey and spices flavor. primeium scotch: Deward’s, Chivas, Jonnie Walker red/black.

posts.title: SOMBRERO
posts.text: VERY SWEET, SERVERED AFTER DINNER. ON THE ROCKS, STRIGHT UP, OR FROZEN. ICE IN THE OLD-FASHIONED GLASS 1 OZ COFFEE FLAVORED BRANDY (KAHLUA) CREAM SHAKE

posts.title: FLAVORED MARTINIS
posts.text: APPLE MARTINIS ICE IN SHAKER, CHILLED M.GLASS 1oz VODKA / APPLE VODKA 1oz SOUR APPLE PUCKERS / APPLE BRANDY TRIPLE-SEC(OPTIONAL), JUST ADD SOUR-MIX STIR 15s CHERRY / APPLE CHOCOLATE MARTINIS ICE IN SHAKER, CHILLED M.GLASS 1oz VODKA / CHOCO-VODKA 1oz DARK CREME DE CACAO / GODIVAS STIR 15s TRIPLE-SEC(OPTIONAL), JUST ADD BALLEY’S LEMON DROP 1oz VODKA / LEMON VODKA 0.5oz TRIPLE SEC 0.5oz SOURMIX SUGAR RIM STIR 15s LEMON COSMOPOLITAN 1oz VODKA 0.25oz TRIPLE-SEC + 0.25oz SOURMIX STIR SLASH OF CRANBERRY J. LEMON TWIST / LIME PREMIUM COSMO : ABSOLUTE CITRON + COINTREAU KAMIKAZE1.5oz vodka + 1oz triple-sec + 1oz lime juice + 0.25oz sour mix >stir< lime garnish FRENCH MARTINIS2oz vodka + 1oz pineapple juice + 0.25oz CHAMBORD + lemon twist and cherry

posts.title: ROB ROY
posts.text: ROB ROY E.S.T.1894, WALDORF HOTEL, NYC.SCOTCH WHISKEY __GLASS SERVE WITH MARTINIS(STRIGHT-UP)GLASS, OR OLD FAISHIONED GLASS(ON-THE-ROCKS)__* ROB ROY ICE 0.5oz SWEET VERMOUTH + 2oz SCTOCH WHISKEY CHERRY DRY R.R ICE 0.5oz DRY VERMOUTH 2oz SCTOCH LEMON TWIST PERFECT ROB R. ICE 0.25oz SWEET & DRY VERMOUTH EACH 2oz SCOTCH LEMON TWIST NEAT/STRIGHT: SHOT GLASS or ROCKS GLASS, or GUEST TELLS YOU.SIDE/CHASER.BACKUSE HIGHBALL GLASS WITH ICECUBES.

posts.text: MANHANTTANS BLEND WITH SWEET VERMOUTH & WHISKEY: SCOTCH/BURBON MANHATTANS ICE (STRIGHT-UP/ROCKS) 2counts/0.5oz SWEET VERMOUTH 2oz/8counts WHISKEY CHERRY DRY MANHATTANS ICE 0.5oz DRY VERMOUTH 2oz WHISKEY LEMON TWIST PERFECT M. ICE 0.25oz sweet VERMOUTH + 0.25oz dry VERMOUTH (1count each) 2oz WHISKEY LEMON TWIST POP WHISKEY BRAND SCOTCHJOHNNIE WALKER, DEWARD’S, CUTTY SARK BOURBON JIMBEAN, MARKER’S MARK, BULLET OTHER JACK DANIELS, SEGRAM’S 7, JAMSON, CROWN ROYAL, V.O. (BRANDY)

posts.title: GIBSON

posts.title: MARTINIS
posts.text: MARTINISMATINIS WITH OLIVE / ONION GARNISH.BEFORE 40S, MARTINIS WITH GIN. NOW MARTINIS WITH GIN/VODKA. GLASS SERVE WITH MARTINIS(STRIGHT-UP)GLASS, OR OLD FAISHIONED GLASS(ON-THE-ROCKS) MARTINIS USE TALL GLASS as SHAKER, STIR 15S. 0.5oz/2counts DRY VERMOUTH 8COUNTS/2oz GIN/VODKA 15s STIR, STRAIN IT in the ROCK/MARTINI GLASS OLIVE DRY-M TALL GLASS WITH ICE 1 COUNT/0.25oz VERMOUTH 2oz GIN/VODKA OLIVE EXT.DRY.MIN & OUT DRY VERMOUTH > 1 DROP, STRAIN IT. ICE 1 DROP VERMOUTH 2.5oz/10COUNTS OF GIN/VODKA OLIVE POP BRAND GINBOMBAY SAPPIRE, TANQUERAY, BEEFEATERS VODKASMIRNOFF, GREY GOOSE, KETELONE, BELVEDERE, ABSOLUTE

posts.title: MARGARITA
posts.text: MARGARITA ICE IN TALL / COLLINS / FIESTA GRANDE GLASS 1oz TEQUILA O.5oz TRIPLE-SEC SOURMIX + hint of lime juice/orangeJuice LIME BLUE MARGARITASAME AS ABOVE, BUT REPLACE TRIPLE SEC BLUE CURACAO (orange liqueur) CADILLAC RITA ICE 1oz PATRON 0.5oz COINTREAU LIME SQUEEZE, SOURMIX Shake FLOAT OF GRAND MARNIER(orange cognac liqueur)
